record.titleTypeName: Business School, National Association of Retail Grocers, 1952
record.description: Left to right: Mrs. Cyril Houle; Dr. Herman Sondel; Fern W. Gleiser (professor, Institution Economics and Management, University of Chicago); Cyril Houle (dean of the College, University of Chicago); Charles Loeffel (business manager, Ahrens Publishing Company); F. B. Wienke (secretary, Wisconsin Retail Food Dealers Association); Mrs. Herman Sondel (University of Chicago); Harvey C. Hagelskamp (secretary, Indiana Retail Grocers and Meat Dealers Association); Albert P. Vicks (secretary, Pennsylvania Food Merchants Association). [Photograph gift of the Graduate School of Business, May 1965].
record.subject4: University of Chicago. Graduate School of Business
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
